title: Perfect tool for work
text:
I work remotely and absolutely love the teams app. I‚Äôm able to get information and respond within seconds.

I had 2 jobs at one point that used teams to communicate love that I‚Äôm able to have multiple accounts within the app. 

Absolutely recommend using Teams for all your communication needs personal and business.

title: Teams App
text: Easier on the mobile phone than the PC.  Scrolling is too hysterical on the PC.

title: Good, but crashes more frequently than would like
text: Good app, but seems to crash bi-weekly (e.g. shutting down, not recognizing my Surface Pro camera, etc).

title: Guest
text: Guest status is ok, but I wish it had a few more of the regular features I used to have as a full member.  (Profile setup, for one.)

title: Great product

title: New to teams
text: We recently converted our org from Google. While this has been a positive move for the most part, Teams would be better if I understood how it would interact with calendars and email. If the goal is an all encompassing experience no matter the tool needed, somehow tie it all back to teams.

title: Login prohibited
text:
I have a personal account and every time I finished inputting password, it‚Äôs prompted: no teams orgs yet....... 
hence I‚Äôm not able to use this app.

Same problem occurs on iPhone as well but not Mac.

Please fix ASAP!

title: Away Message
text: Pretty decent over all, but PLEASE make it easier to edit/add/clear an away message. Way too complicated.

title: Teams
text:
Teams app is very sufficient to get ahold of Supervisor, coworkers,etc. Teams in my opinion offers a lot of benefits. For example I am able to access power points, excel, etc.
Teams is a great way to stay in communication with supervisors, coworkers and to also stay in the knowing of knowledge regarding updates.

title: Overall very pleased! Need to fix CarPlay integration
text: This app works very well and does audio and video conferencing well! It used to read my messages in Apple CarPlay, but that integration has gotten worse, not better. It no longer will read or let you respond to messages on CarPlay. Please bring back and even improve this functionality!

title: Teams Review
text: Honestly it‚Äôs a really great application to have at work since the user interface is very easy to navigate and understandable. The mobile feature makes having work on the phone a breeze and when you want to disconnect from work it‚Äôs just as easy! Far better to use then the next leading app and the ability for connecting devices to Teams is unbeatable. Thoroughly enjoy utilizing this vital tool at work daily, 10/10 for quality!

title: Capture
text: We have a lot of unstructured data coming at us or uncovered with context and content searches.  Teams helps us find a slot for much of the crazy information that we need to be able to find later.

title: It does what it needs to
text: Yup

title: Service
text: Good on the phone for the use of work

title: Multitasking
text: I use the Teams app for two different companies, and I am updated and online for both at the same time.   The meeting reminders are accurate and trustworthy. The app is also very stable and fast. no issues with memory.  I have increased my productivity by multitasking and leveraging on Teams mobile app.

title: Notification Badge Issue
text: Since two updates ago, the notification badge doesn‚Äôt clear. Shows unread notifications on notification badge even when there is nothing unread.

title: Lacks font size control
text: The app work well, except that unlike the desktop version, the iPhone app does not allow the user to set the font size. As such any msg sent will appear with huge size font on other users desktop app.
